verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:28
verses.text: The Lord shall smite thee with madness, and blindness, and astonishment of heart:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:29
verses.text: And thou shalt grope at noonday, as the blind gropeth in darkness, and thou shalt not prosper in thy ways: and thou shalt be only oppressed and spoiled evermore, and no man shall save thee.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 28:30
verses.text: Thou shalt betroth a wife, and another man shall lie with her: thou shalt build an house, and thou shalt not dwell therein: thou shalt plant a vineyard, and shalt not gather the grapes thereof.
